mapper.sql: studentID, studentNO, studClass, studentName, studentPw, major, colledge, passed, score, examtimes, isCheated

from student
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into student (studentID, studentNO, studClass, studentName, studentPw, major, colledge, passed, score, examtimes, isCheated) values (#{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colledge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ischeated,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update student
studentID = #{record.studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
studentNO = #{record.studentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studClass = #{record.studclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studentName = #{record.studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studentPw = #{record.studentpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{record.major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

isCheated = #{record.ischeated,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update student set studentID = #{record.studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, studentNO = #{record.studentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studClass = #{record.studclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentName = #{record.studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentPw = #{record.studentpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{record.major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colledge = #{record.colledge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passed = #{record.passed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, examtimes = #{record.examtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isCheated = #{record.ischeated,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update student

studentName = #{studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studentPw = #{studentpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
colledge = #{colledge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passed = #{passed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examtimes = #{examtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isCheated = #{ischeated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where studentID = #{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and studentNO = #{studentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
